lead_paragraph: Jordan Staal scored in overtime to help the Carolina Hurricanes recover after blowing a three-goal lead and beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 4-3 on Saturday night.

headline.main: Jordan Staal Scores in OT, Hurricanes Beat Blue Jackets 4-3
headline.print_headline: Jordan Staal Scores in OT, Hurricanes Beat Blue Jackets 4-3

snippet: Jordan Staal scored in overtime to help the Carolina Hurricanes recover after blowing a three-goal lead and beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 4-3 on Saturday night....
